title: Riboflavin | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Riboflavin is an essential vitamin to help the body release energy.*
cleaned_text: [Log in](/account?locale=en) [View full details](/products/riboflavin) Product information HELPS THE BODY RELEASE ENERGY* WHAT IT IS Riboflavin (vitamin B2) is the central component in two cofactors: flavin mononucleotide (FMN) and Flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD). It is required for other enzyme reactions including the activation of other vitamins. Riboflavin is important for red blood cell production and helps the body in releasing energy.* HOW IT WORKS IMPORTANT FOR RED BLOOD CELL PRODUCTION* As such, it is required for other enzyme reactions including the activation of other vitamins. Riboflavin is important for red blood cell production and helps the body in releasing energy.* HELPS THE BODY RELEASE ENERGY* WHAT IT IS Riboflavin (vitamin B2) is the central component in two cofactors: flavin mononucleotide (FMN) and Flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD). It is required for other enzyme reactions including the activation of other vitamins. Riboflavin is important for red blood cell production and helps the body in releasing energy.* HOW IT WORKS IMPORTANT FOR RED BLOOD CELL PRODUCTION* As such, it is required for other enzyme reactions including the activation of other vitamins. Riboflavin is important for red blood cell production and helps the body in releasing energy.* INGREDIENTS 400mg Riboflavin (vitamin B2) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Riboflavin Does Not Contain Gluten Soy Dairy Colors Wheat Other Details UPC: 871791004085 SKU: 76843 DIRECTIONS Riboflavin Directions and/or DosageAdults take 1 tablet daily or as recommended by a healthcare professional. WarningDo not use if you are taking any prescription drugs without seeking advice from a healthcare professional. If you are pregnant or nursing, consult a healthcare professional before use. Avoid excessive exposure to UV radiation (e.g. sunlight, tanning) while using this product. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
